page.title: 10TOURISM-CLIFFDOWNE PARC
page.content: Cliffdowne Holiday Parc is owned by Mr.E.C.Clift. He has owned the campsite for five years.The licence was given by the former Padstow Town Council twenty five years ago. {The site is open all year round. There are eighty one spaces altogether, thirty six residential and thirty seven for holiday caravans.The ground rent for permanent caravans used as holiday homes is Â£300 a year. From July to August it's Â£3 a night for touring caravans and tents. Out of season the cost is Â£1.50 a night. {The most popular beaches}close to the site are Harlyn and Trevone.From Cliffdowne to Trevone it is four Kms. {The facilities}are a childrens play area,toilets,showerblock and gamesroom.There are three{full time {employees}and one{part time employee.
